review: I took treatment under Dr Nishant and Dr Alisha. And both are extremely good. Doctor makes you very comfortable by having a cordial discussion and answering your questions patiently. The staff is well trained and courteous too. They give a call post the treatment to check how you are feeling.. **** *** ** ** ****** ************* ** *** ***** *** gives all relevant information about the dental treatment field. Strongly recommend the doctor and the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor is very skilled at his work, thus the procedure is done quickly and efficiently. 

They have the latest machines which aid the treatment. 

 The ambience  of the clinic is nice and the atmosphere at the clinic is relaxed and friendly- taking off the pressure of the dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Nishant Gandhi is a highly experienced and skilled Dental surgeon. I had heard appreciative reviews about him from my cousin who is also a dentist. And all that stood true when I received his treatment myself. 

Dr Nishant Gandhi is amiable and makes you feel comfortable during the treatment and understands your concerns readily. He also tried to be friends with my 3-year-old nephew who accompanied me at my first visit just so that my nephew feels comfortable in the new environment. Dr Gandhi has the latest healthcare technology and equipments available at his clinic which makes the treatment journey quite smooth and less time consuming. Thank you, Dr Gandhi!

Ms. Helen at the reception is extremely helpful and accomodating to your schedules and concerns. She is indeed brings in positivity to the entire treatment experience. She keeps a good follow up to the treatment. Very sweet lady. 

The other assistants, staff, technicians are courteous and professional.

The ambience of Dr Gandhi's clinic is calm and pleasant. Waiting time is very less at the clinic; and even if you have to wait for 5 minutes, that is not an issue at all because the clinic environment is serene.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Excellent ambience with all modern instruments.
Friendliness and taking care nicely.
Nicely examined and decision making carried out for very short duration.Accordingly the wisdom tooth which was for root cause to visit Dr.Nishant was extracted nicely by experienced dental surgeon under his planning.post operative medicines were suggested absolutely which were absolute.
The missing teeth were treated and replaced with best zerconium casted teeth after taking measurements and necessary polishing and filing for the adjacent teeth for cementing cap.

Same were fitted with lifetime warranty.

I am very pleased for quick decision making and necessary treatments within very short duration of my stay in Mumbai.

Wishing him and team all success ahead.Same relationship anticipated for future consultancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Brilliant doctor. Makes you very comfortable and has a very fine hand. RCT gets done within 30 mins.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Zirconia Crowns,Cavities,Re-Root Canal Treatment,Pit and Fissure Sealant,Composite tooth filling,
review: They say, that you are half cured, if you see the smiling face of the doctor . Dr. Nishant is an amazing person with thorough technical skills and is super friendly. I haven't seen any doctor offer patients with coffee and treat you as your equals. He is very  focussed on providing the right treatment and follows up directly on the patient. We need more doctors like Dr. Nishant. Thank you for your help and support doctor and helping me resolve my long pending dental issues. Super Happy 😌

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very courteous and patient with queries.  Also highly attentive to work on hand. Just one dental chair, and full focus on only one patient at a time, which really helps. During procedures, he constantly checks for patient comfort and gives clear, lucid instructions. 

Dr Gandhi seems extremely adept at his work, is quick and efficient.  Plus he is heedful of appointments,  I never had to wait unnecessarily. 

Assistant doctors, consultants and staff in office (e.g. Ms Helen) also very courteous and responsive, and great with follow-up.

Excellent ambience in the clinic, a pleasure to have been there.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Nishant Gandhi made my root canal experience extremely painless & worth it. As someone whose pain tolerance is really low, I was extremely scared to get the RCT done but Dr. Gandhi not only made me comfortable but also took special care of my fear towards injections. The treatment was a 100% painless after the anaesthesia. The procedure was completed in just 10 minutes & was a success. Would highly recommended Dr. Nishant Gandhi for all your dental problems. He’s cooperative, understanding, patient & knows his job well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Nishant Gandhi is a experience doctor in all of dental treatments but as specially he is a expert in root canal treatment 🦷 he is good endodontics. they gives painless root canal treatment. I done my root canal treatment done here for 4 teeth. which is all done painlessly. when I visit here 1st time I was very scared.. but Dr Nishant feels me fearlessness. The way he is understands my fear and make me comfortable for treatment and explaining me about treatment how they will be doing, that is very appritiating.. After completed my treatments I was left the clinic with smiley face. Very trusted Doctor ever. I recommend this 'Dental Surgeon Planet' dental clinic for everyone who needs dental treatments. Please visit once here 😊..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had very severe tooth ache, when i visited him, * ***** *** **** ************* *** explained a problem in detail!  On this experience i agree to do RCT treatment immediately with his very soft handed without pain treatment and i wondered he finished in 15 minutes time completely. and i wont had pain after that ever.

Initially i got doubt that how come RCT can complete in 15 minutes as i did before also which continue for 7 seatings for one tooth and he completed in 15 minutes so after RCT, i asked him my reports and X-rays, he gave me and i checked with another Doctor. and another doctor guided who did this as this doctor did inch perfect RCT. From that day we whole family prefer only his treatment!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr Nishant with my fiancè and he did an amazing job. He was incredibly friendly and accomodating, my fiancè even told me that her fear of the dentist had also been treated since he was so lovely!

Thanks again for everything Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a re-root canal treatment with Dr. Nishant, and I couldn't be more pleased with the results. Dr. Nishant's expertise and attention to detail truly shine through. He not only fixed my teeth but also made the entire experience comfortable and stress-free. I highly recommend Dr. Nishant for anyone seeking top-notch dental care. Thank you, Dr. Nishant

tags: None
review: I had come with severe pain in a tooth with filling done previously by other dentist. I asked Dr. Nishant for reason behind the pain. He immediately took an Xray and explained. At the same time he suggested me to go ahead with Root Canal Treatment. The treatment was painless and was done in one sitting. The crown fixing took another two session. Overall my treatment was completed in three sittings which was comparatively lesser than what others had suggested. I would recommend Dr. Nishant for anyone who would like to get his/her treatment done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Nishant is very gud at his work..he was very friendly and made me feel comfortable as I was very nervous for my treatment..he was so fast in his work and so perfect..he made it a point that the RCT was done perfect..I will definitely recommend him to my family and friends..he is really too gud..Thanks a lot Doc for all your support!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
I had gone for a first ever RCT treatment and I was terrified of the pain. I am really happy to say that the procedure was super fast and nearly painless after the anaesthesia injection.
Overall it’s a 3 sitting RCT where first visit is the actual RCT process, 2nd visit is to take the crown impression and third is to fit the crown.
Everything was fast for me and happened in 3 days.
Post treatment effect is yet to be seen but I am positive and recommend the doctor:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This was the most efficient  RCT I had . Doctor Nishant is very skilled and concerned about the patient. The concern is not just limited to the treatment but the post treatment  care and the time and ease of the patient. Even his staff is very efficient, polite and organized. 

Overall  Dr Gandhi's dental surgeons planet is excellent

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: None
review: Most seamless dental experience ever. I have childhood trauma regarding dental issues. However, Dr Nishant and Dr Ankita along with the entire staff made it look effortless in fixing my tooth. RCT was done in one sitting. All the medical requirements were explained in detail - "what ifs" were answered without hesitation. The appointments were done on time. Most importantly, there was no delay or waiting at the clinic. Immensely satisfied with the entire process - right from consultation, in-chamber experience, and post-treatment follow-ups.

tags: None

He asked me to get the root canal treatment done again but with multiple sittings for proper healing. Now after the treatment I am completely satisfied. And I am thankful to him for giving me valuable time
Hope to meet soon for my oral prophylaxis..

review: Visited Dr. Gandhi for my Father's consultation who was having severe pain and sensation in his right molar tooth. Father wanted to extract the tooth and get done with the pain but doctor rightly guided and suggested how great the tooth is positioned and is very much in good health except it's extreme sensitiveness and suggested to go for RCT to save the tooth. Great experience and consultation. Would definately recommend him to my people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor agreed to see me even though it was a holiday as a first time patient because I was experiencing acute pain. He took the time to examine and give me temporary treatment to alleviate the pain. He was extremely understanding and caring. Doctor Gandhi also arranged for an oral surgeon to come within 48 hours and carry out a wisdom tooth extraction. 5 stars for friendliness, being on time and timely treatment.

review: Dr.  Nishant is very friendly *** *************  I needed to see him immediately as the brace wire was sticking out needed to be trimmed. Although the scheduled visit for the braces was a week away Dr. Nishant immediately accomodated me the next day to cut the wire and put me out of misery.  It may seem a very simple thing but such courtesies speaks volumes about the person and the standards of the clinic.  I wish the doctor all the very best and God bless you.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to doctor for pain in my left lower tooth. He gave advise to extract my wisdom tooth. Pain was well manage by doctors. He did my surgical procedure in single sitting because i was running out of time and he managed well.
